title: Fnatic (FNC) v Edward Gaming (EDG), Quarter final # 3
body:
Who do you think will win.
My profile icon speaks 4 itself

replies.body: I'm going to say EDG bringing koro1 into starting lineup over AmazingJ should make a huge difference. AmazingJ was pretty lacklustre during poolplay.

just because someone is bad, doesnt mean his replacement is going to be awesome.

the reason they replaced koro with amazingj is because amazing picked up the new champs for this meta faster, koro may be worse, we will see.

> [{quoted}](name=Wicam,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MqXcNPPd,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-17T03:35:15.890+0000)
>
> just because someone is bad, doesnt mean his replacement is going to be awesome.
> 
> the reason they replaced koro with amazingj is because amazing picked up the new champs for this meta faster, koro may be worse, we will see.

I feel that koro's TP plays are better than AmazingJ and maybe that will be what makes EDG win

I want Fnatic to win but I suspect EDG will show up in a huge way.

Definitely expect this to goto 5 games.

I hope so.
Fnatic have the home ground advantage

HUNI U BETTER CARRY OR SOMETHING.
PLOX
